description:
Neil, a kind-hearted demon, is invited by Ira, a vampire and his best friend, to sneak out from Hell to the Human World he longs to visit. In addition to Ira, Neil lives at 1031 All Saints Street with his landlord, Lynn the angel, and Abu the mummy. They are joined there by Damao, a werewolf who came to town for a certain purpose…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Neil! Let`s Get a Part-Time Job!
バイトしよう! ニール!
